item.title: What Ignited My Love For Data Science
item.description: Starting by outlining the purpose of data science in today’s world, this brief talk by Parker Addison sheds light into what ignited an interest in observing, analyzing, and communicating data. This was scheduled as the first talk in a series of Ignite Talks with a theme of discovering and pursuing career paths. Ignite Talks are like super-fast TED talks—a speedy style of presentation in which slides advance automatically every 15 seconds, resulting in a 5-minute total run time.
